testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Verify multiple interactive elements exist (buttons, forms, links)
Check for proper navigation structure with header and footer
Verify application shows perfume e-commerce content, not 'Vite + React' text
Confirm product listings are visible on homepage
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows functional e-commerce features with perfume products
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: UI Components Test
testCases.description: Test that UI components are properly implemented
steps: Check for navigation menu with product categories
Look for shopping cart icon and functionality
Test mobile menu toggle on smaller screens
Verify footer with company information and links
testCases.expectedOutcome: All major UI components are present and functional

testCases.name: Content Quality Test
testCases.description: Verify application has meaningful e-commerce content
steps: Check homepage displays featured perfume products
Verify product cards show images, names, prices
Look for proper branding and professional design
Ensure content is relevant to perfume/fragrance industry
Verify no lorem ipsum or placeholder text
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application demonstrates real perfume e-commerce functionality

testCases.name: User Registration Test
testCases.description: Test user account creation functionality
steps: Fill out registration form with valid data
Submit form and verify success response
Check that user is automatically logged in
Verify user profile information is saved
testCases.expectedOutcome: New user account created successfully with automatic login

testCases.name: User Login Test
testCases.description: Test user authentication with existing credentials
steps: Check that user session is maintained
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logs in and gains access to protected features

testCases.name: Admin Login Test
testCases.description: Test admin authentication and access to admin panel
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin successfully logs in and accesses admin panel

testCases.name: Product Listing Test
testCases.description: Test product catalog display and functionality
steps: Verify products are displayed in grid layout
Check product cards show image, name, price, brand
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product catalog displays correctly with working filters and search

testCases.name: Product Detail Test
testCases.description: Test individual product page functionality
steps: Click on a product from the listing page
Verify product detail page loads with complete information
Check product images, description, price, and specifications
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product detail page shows comprehensive information and allows adding to cart

testCases.name: Shopping Cart Test
testCases.description: Test shopping cart functionality and persistence
steps: Add multiple products to cart from different pages
Open cart sidebar and verify items are listed
Test quantity adjustment for cart items
Check cart persistence across page refreshes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Shopping cart works correctly with proper calculations and persistence

testCases.name: Checkout Process Test
testCases.description: Test complete checkout flow for authenticated users
steps: Add items to cart and proceed to checkout
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete checkout process works from cart to order confirmation

testCases.name: Guest Checkout Test
testCases.description: Test checkout process for guest users
steps: Add items to cart without logging in
Fill in guest email and shipping information
Verify order can be placed without account
testCases.expectedOutcome: Guest users can complete purchases without creating accounts

testCases.name: Order History Test
testCases.description: Test order history display for logged-in users
steps: Log in as user with existing orders
Check order details, status, and items
testCases.expectedOutcome: Order history displays correctly with complete order information

testCases.name: User Profile Management Test
testCases.description: Test user profile viewing and editing
steps: Log in and navigate to user dashboard (/account)
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can view and update profile information successfully

testCases.name: Address Management Test
testCases.description: Test shipping and billing address management
testCases.expectedOutcome: Address management works correctly with CRUD operations

testCases.name: Wishlist Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test product wishlist features
steps: Add products to wishlist from product pages
Test moving items from wishlist to cart
testCases.expectedOutcome: Wishlist functionality works for saving and managing favorite products

testCases.name: Search Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test product search capabilities
steps: Use search bar to search for specific products
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search returns relevant results and handles various query types

testCases.name: Category Filtering Test
testCases.description: Test product filtering by categories
testCases.expectedOutcome: Category filtering works correctly and shows appropriate products

testCases.name: Price Range Filtering Test
testCases.description: Test product filtering by price range
steps: Verify products shown are within price range
testCases.expectedOutcome: Price filtering accurately shows products within specified range

testCases.name: Admin Product Management Test
testCases.description: Test admin product management capabilities
steps: View product list with admin controls
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can manage products with full CRUD operations

testCases.name: Admin Order Management Test
testCases.description: Test admin order management functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin can view and manage customer orders effectively

testCases.name: Contact Form Test
testCases.description: Test contact form submission
steps: Fill out contact form with valid information
Test form validation with invalid data
testCases.expectedOutcome: Contact form submits successfully and shows appropriate feedback

testCases.name: Newsletter Subscription Test
testCases.description: Test newsletter subscription functionality
steps: Find newsletter signup form (likely in footer)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Newsletter subscription works with proper validation and feedback

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Check that all features work on mobile
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application is fully responsive and functional across all device sizes

testCases.name: Performance Test
testCases.description: Test application loading performance and responsiveness
steps: Check for memory leaks during extended use
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly and performs well under normal usage

testCases.name: Error Handling Test
testCases.description: Test application error handling and user feedback
steps: Test form submissions with missing required fields
Test invalid product IDs in URLs
Verify appropriate error messages are shown
Check that errors don't crash the application
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with helpful user feedback

test_data_requirements.product_data: Database contains sample perfume products with images
test_data_requirements.order_data: Some test users have existing order history
test_data_requirements.admin_accounts: Admin users available for management testing

critical_paths: User Registration → Login → Browse Products → Add to Cart → Checkout → Order Confirmation
Admin Login → Product Management → Order Management
Guest User → Browse Products → Add to Cart → Guest Checkout

test_environment_notes.database_state: Contains seed data with products, users, and sample orders
test_environment_notes.authentication: Uses JWT tokens with plain text passwords for development
test_environment_notes.external_services: Payment processing and email services are mocked
